name: GO Series EARTH SAVER
description:
Land your spaceship on the meteorite and set explosives to break off small pieces so the rock breaks up in the earth's atmosphere. Chunks of meteorite that are too big will smash into Earth, wiping out mankind!

As an explosives expert, you can plant a series of bombs to create chain reaction-combos, blasting off chunks of rock the size of houses with ease. You'll also need to tackle the many strange alien lifeforms you come across, by either blowing them up or by cunningly blasting around the piece of rock they are standing on so they fall with the meteorite. Can you save the earth from being obliterated and secure the future of mankind?
